name: INDIE NIGHT @ LOVE2LOVE - FEAT. OUT LIKE A LION & LOCAL SUPPORTS
description:
XPLOSIV! PROMOTIONS TAKE OVER LOVE2LOVE!
PRESENTING...
INDIE NIGHT!

FEATURING 4 LIVE BANDS:

OUT LIKE A LION - Indie / Alternative

PLUS SUPPORT FROM TOP LOCAL BANDS:
3 HOUR WEEK - Indie / Alternative / Rock
&
THE RICKASHAYS - Indie / Reggae / Folk
&
ONE MORE TO BE ANNOUNCED

FRIDAY 4TH FEBRUARY 2011
DOORS AT 7:00PM - FIRST BAND AT 7:30PM
LOVE2LOVE - DONCASTER ROAD, SCUNTHORPE, DN15 7RQ

DRINKS £1 EACH ALL NIGHT (EXCLUDING CHAMPAGNE & COCKTAILS)

£4 ENTRY - INCLUDES FREE ADMISSION TO CLUB NIGHT AFTER THE BANDS FOR ALL OVER 18'S

ALL UNDER 18'S WILL BE ASKED TO LEAVE THE PREMISES BEFORE 11:00PM
